resources.string: SplashFood
Hello blank fragment
close drawer
open drawer
Q1. What is a dial meal repaid account mode of payment ?
Q2. Can I order more than 2 meals at a time?
Q3. Why do you charge delivery charges?
Q4. Are the rate listed in app accurate and binding
Q5. Can I get discount for big orders
Q6. Do you deliver cutleries such as spoon and plates
Q7. Can I cancel the order?

A1. You can Fill-up a particular amount NO minimum amount requiredâ€¦ but, we recommend a minimum amount of INR. 500 and incremental slabs of INR. 500. This Account Fill-up (initially) or Top-up (subsequently) can be done by CASH, ONLINE PAYMENT or CARD. This option allows you the flexibility to order when you are on the move or to GIFT a Meal or to Order for someone else (family or friends), while you are on the move.
A2.Yes, of course! However each restaurant order will be treated as a different order. So the delivery charges may be applicable for each order.

A3. Each restaurant gives us a small percentage of the order amount. But for small orders we cannot afford to deliver within the commission we receive. Instead of declining such orders, we give you the option of delivering it to you, if you are prepared to pay the delivery charges.

A4.We make every effort to keep the prices updated and accurate. Prices listed on this website are however approximate and subject to changes by the Restaurant and Taxes. The final price is as per the ACTUAL BILL raised by the Restaurant and presented to you, at the time of the delivery.

A5. Sorry, as a practice we do not give discounts as we work on very slim margins, already. But, we could check with the Restaurant - and IF they offer any special discount, we would be happy to pass it on to you!

A6. Not usually. But if the order is large and you give us advance notice (more than 2 hours), we could arrange it for you - but, this is at the sole discretion of Dial-a-Meal, based on prior commitments, etc.
A7. After getting final notification of placing order you can not cancel the order as the restaurant is notified and it begins preparing the order. but before that you van cancel the order.
